message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, which I believe will be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not willing to pay $2000000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking for a fair price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1900000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1700000. I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1700000. I'm counteroffering at $1750000. This is my final compromise, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1650000. I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price, but I need to stay within my budget.
